page.title: 04Haddenham Childrens' Games
page.content:
{Elastic:}Two people called{First- or {Second- Ender}stand 2m apart facing each other. The elastic, tied together, stretches round their ankles. A third person{jumps in {between the elastic,}saying rhymes. If done succesfully the elastic is moved up to knee height and the jumping repeated. The elastic is then moved to waist height. If the jumper trips she takes the place of one Ender.
{Spot:}One person{bounces a ball}so it hits the floor then a wall. The next person must catch it before it bounces again. When he has dropped it 4 times he is out.{The last person left is the {winner.
